alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lee; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 6:20AM CDT until June 18 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lafayette County in northwestern Mississippi... Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... Southwestern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 620 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pinedale, or 11 miles southwest of New Albany, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, New Albany, Pontotoc, Baldwyn, Verona, Trace State Park, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Plantersville, Ecru, Keownville, New Harmony, Randolph, Troy, Etta, Blair, Furrs, Pinedale and Sherman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
